name: x800!
description: Simple 2048-like puzzle game for LOWREZJAM 2019. But in hex because I couldn't fit '2048' in 1/16 of 64x64. Also I'm not certain the behaviour is quite the same as at 2048.org but I like the way this algorithm plays and that the code for it is super short. I set myself the challenge of using no image sprites, only text labels and drawn lines. First experience with dragonruby-gtk and itch.io.
